title: 1.12多个tag检测
author: 26号猪肉
txt_content:
版本1.12 再说远古版本打手
某个玩家拥有两个tag 这里举例A,B
可是/effect @a[tag=A,tag=B] 1 1 1
却是只拥有一个tag就能触发
1.12能否实现玩家拥有两个tag时才能触发的选择器？

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
execute @a[tag=A]   ...........effect @s[tag=B]
大概这个样子把。。。。我不记得那个时候有没有@s了

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard players tag @a remove AB
scoreboard players tag @a add AB {Tags:["A","B"]}}

replies.author: 26号猪肉
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-8-13 13:31
scoreboard players tag @a remove AB
scoreboard players tag @a add AB {Tags:["A","B"]}}
两个办法都很好qwq
纠结...
爱心少的最佳吧QAQ
